game.shortDescription: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.

reviewHighlights.text: Its not bad, not for the easily frustrated for sure because its so chaotic, you'll die a lot. Also, the music is horrible, mute it or suffer.
Thought this would be a cute little fun game to play for shits and giggles however a friend took a look at the reviews - they're all from Saudi Arabia...
